![Early Phoenician seal, dedicated to goddess Kubaba by Matrunna, daughter of Aplahanda, 19th century BCE](https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/4/4c/Image_from_page_35_of_%22Ancient_seals_of_the_Near_East%22_%281940%29.jpg/330px-Image_from_page_35_of_%22Ancient_seals_of_the_Near_East%22_%281940%29.jpg) 

The Phoenicians were a Semitic-speaking people of somewhat unknown origin who emerged in the Levant around 3000 BC.

According to Homer they came from the Red Sea, thus linking them with [Punt](Punt.html).

It is debated whether Phoenicians were actually distinct from the broader group of Semitic-speaking peoples known as Canaanites Î¦Î¿Î¹Î½Î¯ÎºÎ· peculiar Qvoinikin? ğ¤Šğ¤ğ¤ğ¤@Knossos  ğ’†³ğ’† ğ’ˆ¾ğ’„´ğ’ˆ¾ KUR.ki-na-aá¸«-na KinÃ¢á¸«na Î§Î½á¾¶ ×›× ×¢×Ÿ
